result.execSummary:
One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Lori J Klein is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Order for Dismissal
from Atty Hawley to Judge Stengel with letter from pastor attached regarding the Defendant's counseling

Conditions:
Expires 5/28/2017
During term of DCA, defendant shall commit no violation to level of probable cause.
If DCA not revoked during term, charge shall be dismissed.
No revocation may take place without hearing before Court and notice to all parties.
Defendant waives right to speedy trial.
Defendant shall maintain "no violent or abusive contact" with JLK during the course of this DCA.
Defendant shall no engage in any physical discipline of JLK during the course of this DCA.
Defendant shall possess no controlled substances w/o a prescription.
Defendant shall make a good faith effort to initiate family counseling with JLK.
Invent expiration date expires, nothing in DCA or laws of State shall prevent State from seeking revocation of DCA if State has filed motion to revoke prior to the expiration date.
Defendant shall notify Clerk of Court's Office within 72 hours of change of address.
waiver of rights
